channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-1571|2024-09-17T02:16:22.591Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 131853.

item.title: CVE-2017-1438|2024-09-17T02:57:10.720Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) could allow a local user with DB2 instance owner privileges to obtain root access. IBM X-Force ID: 128057.

item.title: CVE-2019-4102|2024-09-17T04:05:02.616Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 158092.

item.title: CVE-2019-4386|2024-09-17T03:43:26.459Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.1 could allow an authenticated user to execute a function that would cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 162714.

item.title: CVE-2018-1566|2024-09-17T00:55:57.754Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local user to execute arbitrary code due to a format string error. IBM X-Force ID: 143023.

item.title: CVE-2018-1565|2024-09-17T02:31:12.378Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local user to overflow a buffer which may result in a privilege escalation to the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 143022.

item.title: CVE-2020-4739|2024-09-17T02:05:51.808Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 Accessories Suite for Linux, UNIX, and Windows, DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a local authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by DLL search order hijacking vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client. By placing a specially crafted file in a compromised folder, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 188149.

item.title: CVE-2018-1781|2024-09-17T03:28:49.349Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local user to obtain root access by exploiting a symbolic link attack to read/write/corrupt a file that they originally did not have permission to access. IBM X-Force ID: 148804.

item.title: CVE-2018-1487|2024-09-17T03:59:28.929Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5 and 11.1 binaries load shared libraries from an untrusted path potentially giving low privilege users full access to the DB2 instance account by loading a malicious shared library. IBM X-Force ID: 140972.

item.title: CVE-2019-4016|2024-09-17T01:20:43.801Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-ForceID: 155894.

item.title: CVE-2018-1488|2024-09-17T03:55:08.500Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5 and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 140973.

item.title: CVE-2018-1544|2024-09-17T03:18:32.180Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local user to overflow a buffer which may result in a privilege escalation to the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 142648.

item.title: CVE-2019-4322|2024-09-17T04:03:54.544Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 161202.

item.title: CVE-2018-1448|2024-09-17T03:32:39.003Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to overwrite arbitrary files owned by the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 140043.

item.title: CVE-2018-1922|2024-09-17T02:51:42.208Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is affected by buffer overflow vulnerability that can potentially result in arbitrary code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 152858.

item.title: CVE-2018-1980|2024-09-17T01:50:39.838Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-ForceID: 154078.

item.title: CVE-2021-29752|2024-09-17T03:12:34.660Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 11.2 and 11.5 contains an information disclosure vulnerability, exposing remote storage credentials to privileged users under specific conditions. IBM X-Fporce ID: 201780.

item.title: CVE-2018-1977|2024-09-17T00:11:53.091Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) contains a denial of service vulnerability. A remote, authenticated DB2 user could exploit this vulnerability by issuing a specially-crafted SELECT statement with TRUNCATE function. IBM X-Force ID: 154032.

item.title: CVE-2018-1923|2024-09-17T01:46:23.158Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is affected by buffer overflow vulnerability that can potentially result in arbitrary code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 152859.

item.title: CVE-2021-20373|2024-09-17T00:45:54.177Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 may be vulnerable to an Information Disclosure when using the LOAD utility as under certain circumstances the LOAD utility does not enforce directory restrictions. IBM X-Force ID: 199521.

item.title: CVE-2018-1834|2024-09-17T01:01:02.402Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to root through a symbolic link attack. IBM X-Force ID: 150511.

item.title: CVE-2021-38931|2024-09-17T00:31:46.640Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to an information disclosure as a result of a connected user having indirect read access to a table where they are not authorized to select from. IBM X-Force ID: 210418.

item.title: CVE-2019-4154|2024-09-17T02:42:10.865Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-Force ID: 158519.

item.title: CVE-2018-1450|2024-09-17T02:06:11.386Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to overwrite arbitrary files owned by the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 140045.

item.title: CVE-2019-4094|2024-09-17T02:42:48.476Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 binaries load shared libraries from an untrusted path potentially giving low privilege user full access to root by loading a malicious shared library. IBM X-Force ID: 158014.

item.title: CVE-2017-1519|2024-09-17T02:27:20.115Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 10.5 and 11.1 contains a denial of service vulnerability. A remote user can cause disruption of service for DB2 Connect Server setup with a particular configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 129829.

item.title: CVE-2017-1677|2024-09-17T01:00:38.016Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Data Server Driver for JDBC and SQLJ (IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1) deserializes the contents of /tmp/connlicj.bin which leads to object injection and potentially arbitrary code execution depending on the classpath. IBM X-Force ID: 133999.

item.title: CVE-2018-1711|2024-09-17T01:21:12.869Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local user to to gain privileges due to allowing modification of columns of existing tasks. IBM X-Force ID: 146369.

item.title: CVE-2018-1452|2024-09-17T01:41:55.913Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to overwrite arbitrary files owned by the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 140047.

item.title: CVE-2023-29267|2024-08-28T15:02:43.378Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.

item.title: CVE-2024-35136|2024-08-15T15:11:35.304Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) federated server 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 291307.

item.title: CVE-2024-35152|2024-08-14T17:58:00.335Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service with a specially crafted query due to improper memory allocation. IBM X-Force ID: 292639.

item.title: CVE-2023-52296|2024-08-02T22:55:41.095Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service when querying a specific UDF built-in function concurrently. IBM X-Force ID: 278547.

item.title: CVE-2024-28762|2024-08-02T00:56:58.142Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.title: CVE-2023-38729|2024-07-12T21:01:13.640Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.
